How many people are affected by congenital hepatic fibrosis ?,"Isolated congenital hepatic fibrosis is rare. Its prevalence is unknown. The total prevalence of syndromes that include congenital hepatic fibrosis as a feature is estimated to be 1 in 10,000 to 20,000 individuals.",GHR,congenital hepatic fibrosis
